ovdesc.p: This application holds the linkage between the user created application defined in EB.TABLE.DEFINITION (or CODE) and a processable product in SY.PRODUCT.DEFINITION.
Additionally this table allows the definiton of fields that are mandatory for a product to be traded and mapping of those fields into SY.TRANSACTION for SY core processing.

desc.p: Defines if the field defined in the DEALER.DESK.FIELD is mandatory on the user created application.
Defines the version which will be used to view deals in the application specified in USER.APPLICATION
Defines if the field defined in the DEPOSIT.AMT.FIELD, DEPOSIT.CCY.FIELD and ACCOUNT.FIELD are mandatory on the user created application.
Defines the name of the field from the user created application that holds the Portfolio of the counterparty.
Defines the product (SY.PRODUCT.DEFINITION) that the table defined in the key is linked to.
Defines the name of the field from the user created application that holds the counterparty on the deal.
Defines the name of the field from the user created application that holds the amount of deposit to take from the customer.
A valid T24 application/EB.TABLE.DEFINITION created locally for use with SY processing.
Defines the name of the field from the user created application that holds the trade date to be used to create underlying deals.
Defines if the field defined in the CURRENCY.MARKET.FIELD is mandatory on the user created application.
Defines if the field defined in the PORTFOLIO.FIELD is mandatory on the user created application.
Defines if the field defined in the CUSTOMER.FIELD is mandatory on the user created application.
Defines the name of the field from the user created application that holds the value date to be used to create underlying deals.
Defines if the field defined in the VALUE.DATE.FIELD is mandatory on the user created application.
Defines the name of the field from the user created application that holds the currency market for the the deal
Defines the name of the field from the user created application that holds the currency of the depoist being taken from the customer.
Defines the version which will be used to edit deals in the application specified in USER.APPLICATION
Defines the version which will be used to authorise deals in the application specified in USER.APPLICATION
Defines if the field defined in the MAT.DATE.FIELD field are mandatory on the user created application.
Defines the name of the field from the user created application that holds the dealer desk to user for the deal.
Defines the name of the field from the user created application that holds the customers portfolio.
Defines the name of the field from the user created application that holds the maturity date of the Structured deal.
A valid T24 application/EB.TABLE.DEFINITION created locally for use with SY processing.
Defines the version which will be used to reverse deals in the application specified in USER.APPLICATION
Defines if the field defined in the COUNTERPARY.FIELD is mandatory on the user created application.
Defines if the field defined in the TRADE.DATE.FIELD is mandatory on the user created application.
Defines the version which will be used to delete deals in the application specified in USER.APPLICATION
Defines the version which will be used to enter new deals in the application specified in USER.APPLICATION
Defines the name of the field from the user created application that holds the customer party to the the deal.
Defines if the field defined in the COUNTER.PTFO.FIELD is mandatory on the user created application.
Standard Override Field
Defines the name of the field from the user created application that holds the Account from which a deposit may be taken.
Defines if the field defined in the ACCOUNT.FIELD is mandatory on the user created application.
Defines the name of the field from the user created application that holds the Account Officer for the deal.
Defines if the field defined in the ACCOUNT.OFFICER.FIELD is mandatory on the user created application.
